steps.title: Create an Ext4 Filesystem on a Partition

verify.name: Verify Ext4 filesystem creation
verify.hint: The /dev/sdb1 partition should have an Ext4 filesystem.

verify.name: Verify Ext4 filesystem parameters
verify.hint:
The Ext4 filesystem on /dev/sdb1 should have the following parameters:
- Block size: 4096 bytes
- Inode size: 8192 bytes
- Volume name: "my_filesystem"
